tuv.seg: Care in your community
Cúram i do phobal
Public health services in Ireland delivered in the community are called community care services
Tugtar seirbhísí cúraim phobail ar sheirbhísí sláinte phoiblí in Éirinn a sheachadtar sa phobal
Overview of services and links to other sections of this site
Forbhreathnú ar sheirbhísí agus naisc le rannóga eile an tsuímh seo
Home Help services usually assists people to remain in their own home and to avoid going in to institutional care
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na seirbhísí a chuireann cúntóirí baile ar fáil agus ar an bhfáil atá orthu
Occupational therapy services in Ireland are designed to help people with disabilities achieve the maximum degree of independence in ordinary living
Déantar na seirbhísí teiripe saothair in Éirinn a dhearadh ar bhealach go bhféadfaidh siad cabhrú le daoine míchumasaithe an oiread neamhspleáchais agus is féidir a bhaint amach ina ngnáthshaol
Physiotherapy services may be provided through the public health service, and are also available privately
Is féidir seirbhísí fisiteiripe a chur ar fáil tríd an tseirbhís sláinte poiblí, agus tá siad ar fáil go príobháideach freisin
Public health nurses are employed by Health Service Executive (HSE) Areas to provide a range of health care services in the community
Tá Altraí Sláinte Phoiblí fostaithe ag Feidhmeannacht Seirbhíse Sláinte chun réimhse seirbhísí cúraim sláinte sa phobal a sholáthar
Social work services are provided through the public health services
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na seirbhísí oibre sóisialta atá soláthartha ag na seirbhísí sláinte phoiblí
The Health Service Executive (HSE) is obliged to provide certain social work services. Find out more
Tá dualgas ar Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte seirbhísí oibre sóisialta áirithe a sholáthar
Speech and language therapy services
Seirbhísí teiripe urlabhra agus teanga
Speech and language therapy services are available through the public health service
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar na seirbhísí teiripe urlabhra agus teanga atá ar fáil ón tseirbhís sláinte poiblí
How services are delivered and how to apply
Conas atá seirbhísí seachadta agus conas iarratas a dhéanamh
Dietitians are health professionals who give advice and information on all aspects of nutrition and diet
Is éard atá i nDiaitéiteach/Saineolaithe Cothúcháin ná oibrí proifisiúnta sláinte a thugann comhairle agus eolas cruinn maidir le gach gné den chothú agus den aiste bia
Chiropodists/podiatrists assess, diagnose and treat diseases and abnormalities of the foot
Déanann coslianna fadhbanna a bhaineann leis an gcos a scrúdú, a fháthmheas agus cóireáil a chur ar fáil dóibh
Some Local Health Offices provide chiropody services to certain eligible people
Cuireann cuid de na hOifigí Sláinte Áitiúil seirbhísí cosliachta ar fáil do dhaoine áirid atá ina dteideal
Most Read in "Health"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Sláinte"
Admission to a psychiatric hospital
Ospidéal síciatrach a iontráil
Medical card means test: aged under 70
Tástáil mhaoine cárta leighis: daoine faoi bhun 70 bliain d’aois
